See discussion in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/398

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-680?focusedCommentId=15935624) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Seems this problem only impacts older CMake versions on Debian platforms (including Ubuntu), and it was fixed in https://github.com/Kitware/CMake/commit/620939e4e6f5a61cd5c0fac2704de4bfda0eb7ef. I'm not sure about an appropriate workaround (we could vendor GNUInstallDirs.cmake)
